adoption noun
(TAKING CHILD)
Add to word list

B2 [ C or U ] the act of legally taking a child to be taken care of as your own: put someone up for adoption She was homeless and had to put her child up for adoption (= ask for the child to be taken by someone else as their own). The last ten years have seen a dramatic fall in the number of adoptions.
